GeneDef.label: Polluted orgasmic Mytosis
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene grow more unstable with ongoing multiple orgasms in a polluted environnement - climaxing in a process of mytosis. This will result in an (biologically) identical pawn and both twins are set in a regenerative state. Also, the pawn can have multiple orgasms: In a state of higher unstableness, they come quicker.
